api

Interface ISerializable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IActiveComponent, IComponent, IEntity, IEntitySystem, IEvent, IEventListener, IEventSystem, ISystem, ISystemManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Attack, Collision, Defense, Entity, EntitySystem, Health, ImagePath, Mass, Orientation, Position, Score, Speed, SystemManager, Velocity, Visible

    public interface ISerializable
extends java.io.Serializable
    Interface for serializable objects. Indicates that an object may be read and written from a file, and allows a few methods to do so.
    Author:
    Rhondu Smithwick, Tom Wu

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default java.io.File serialize(java.lang.String fileName)
      Serializes this object to a File
      default java.lang.String serializeToString()
      Serializes this object to a String

    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        default java.io.File serialize(java.lang.String fileName)
        Serializes this object to a File
        Returns:
        File representing the serialized form of this object

      • serializeToString

        default java.lang.String serializeToString()
        Serializes this object to a String
        Returns:
        String representing the serialized form of this object
